countries.name: Bahamas
countries.description: World's first fully deployed CBDC. Provides digital payment infrastructure for remote islands.

countries.name: Nigeria
countries.description: Africa's first CBDC. Low adoption despite aggressive government push and crypto restrictions.

countries.name: Jamaica
countries.description: Digital Jamaican dollar operating alongside physical cash.

countries.name: Eastern Caribbean
countries.description: First CBDC in a currency union. Covers 8 islands. Temporarily offline in 2024 for technical issues.

countries.name: China
countries.description: World's largest CBDC pilot with 260M+ users. Over $1 trillion in transactions by 2024. Integrated with social credit system.

countries.name: India
countries.description: Second-largest CBDC pilot. Over â‚¹10 billion in circulation by 2025. Rapid expansion planned.

countries.name: Brazil
countries.description: Advanced programmable money with smart contracts. Asset tokenization and DeFi integration.

countries.name: Russia
countries.description: Expanding despite sanctions. Used for capital controls and sanctions evasion.

countries.name: Sweden
countries.description: Testing as cash usage drops below 10%. Privacy-focused design but cash elimination concerns.

countries.name: Thailand
countries.description: Retail CBDC pilot for domestic payments. Surveillance concerns under military influence.

countries.name: Saudi Arabia
countries.description: Wholesale CBDC with UAE for cross-border settlements. Retail research expanding.

countries.name: United Arab Emirates
countries.description: Cross-border CBDC focus. First cross-border payment to China in 2024.

countries.name: Turkey
countries.description: Testing digital lira amid high inflation. First transactions completed in 2022.

countries.name: Japan
countries.description: Multi-phase pilot by Bank of Japan. Focus on offline capability and privacy.

countries.name: South Korea
countries.description: Testing retail CBDC with fintech integration and cross-border settlements.

countries.name: Singapore
countries.description: Wholesale CBDC focus. Testing cross-border and multi-currency settlements.

countries.name: Australia
countries.description: Pilot focusing on wholesale use cases. Retail CBDC development on hold.

countries.name: South Africa
countries.description: Testing wholesale CBDC for interbank settlements and financial inclusion.

countries.name: Kazakhstan
countries.description: Pilot running through 2025. Focus on financial inclusion and reducing cash.

countries.name: Philippines
countries.description: Wholesale CBDC pilot with select financial institutions through 2024.

countries.name: Ukraine
countries.description: Accelerated pilot. Government officials taking salaries in digital currency.

countries.name: Iran
countries.description: Digital rial for sanctions evasion and capital control. Extreme surveillance risk.

countries.name: Hong Kong
countries.description: Multiple pilots for retail and wholesale. Integration with China's e-CNY planned.

countries.name: Laos
countries.description: Testing prototype since 2023. Focus on reducing dollarization.

countries.name: European Union
countries.description: ECB preparing digital euro for 2028 launch. Transaction limits and holding caps planned.

countries.name: United Kingdom
countries.description: Bank of England developing digital pound. Expected launch 2025-2030.

countries.name: Israel
countries.description: Extensive draft design released 2025. Offline and programmable features.

countries.name: Indonesia
countries.description: Garuda Project launched 2022. Digital Rupiah legalized in 2024.

countries.name: United States
countries.description: Trump executive order (Jan 2025) halted all CBDC work. Only country to officially cancel CBDC. Wholesale cross-border research continues via Project AgorÃ¡.

countries.name: Canada
countries.description: Project Jasper completed. Active development paused in late 2024.

countries.name: Switzerland
countries.description: Wholesale CBDC trials. Project Helvetia III extended. Public resistance strong.

countries.name: Norway
countries.description: Norges Bank researching CBDC. Focus on declining cash usage.

countries.name: Mexico
countries.description: Bank of Mexico researching CBDC. Focus on financial inclusion and remittances.

countries.name: Argentina
countries.description: Early research phase. Focus on combating high inflation and dollarization.

countries.name: New Zealand
countries.description: Reserve Bank of New Zealand conducting research. Public consultation ongoing.

countries.name: Ghana
countries.description: Pilot launched in 2024. Focus on financial inclusion and remittances.

countries.name: Malaysia
countries.description: Wholesale CBDC pilot for interbank settlements and Islamic finance integration.

countries.name: Vietnam
countries.description: Pilot testing for retail CBDC. Government control concerns in one-party state.

countries.name: Nepal
countries.description: Preliminary pilot testing started April 2025. Focus on financial inclusion.

countries.name: Cambodia
countries.description: Blockchain-based retail CBDC launched October 2020. Cross-border remittances focus.

countries.name: Kenya
countries.description: Pilot launched 2024. Building on M-Pesa mobile money success.

countries.name: Zimbabwe
countries.description: Gold-backed CBDC launched 2024. Response to hyperinflation and currency instability.

countries.name: Egypt
countries.description: Retail CBDC pilot. Concerns about authoritarian surveillance and capital controls.

countries.name: Morocco
countries.description: Bank Al-Maghrib researching CBDC options. Focus on financial inclusion.

countries.name: France
countries.description: Part of EU Digital Euro project. Extensive wholesale CBDC trials completed.

countries.name: Germany
countries.description: Part of EU Digital Euro. Strong public resistance due to privacy concerns and cash preference.

countries.name: Italy
countries.description: Part of EU Digital Euro project. Testing retail and wholesale use cases.

countries.name: Spain
countries.description: Part of EU Digital Euro. Active in wholesale CBDC trials.

countries.name: Netherlands
countries.description: Part of EU Digital Euro. Focus on innovation and privacy-preserving tech.

countries.name: Colombia
countries.description: Banco de la RepÃºblica researching CBDC. Focus on financial inclusion.

countries.name: Chile
countries.description: Central Bank of Chile researching CBDC options and implications.

countries.name: Peru
countries.description: CBDC pilot started 2023. Modernizing national financial infrastructure.

countries.name: Uruguay
countries.description: Completed pilot test in 2017. Currently researching next steps.

countries.name: Bahrain
countries.description: Wholesale CBDC pilot for cross-border settlements with regional partners.

countries.name: Qatar
countries.description: Qatar Central Bank researching CBDC for wholesale and retail use.

countries.name: Fiji
countries.description: Reserve Bank of Fiji researching CBDC for financial inclusion.

countries.name: Taiwan
countries.description: Central Bank testing retail CBDC. Focus on technology and privacy.

countries.name: Poland
countries.description: National Bank strongly opposed to CBDC. Public resistance to digital surveillance.

countries.name: Denmark
countries.description: Danmarks Nationalbank researching CBDC but no immediate plans.

countries.name: Austria
countries.description: Part of EU Digital Euro project. Strong cash culture and privacy concerns.

countries.name: Belgium
countries.description: Part of EU Digital Euro. ECB headquarters involvement in development.

countries.name: Pakistan
countries.description: State Bank researching CBDC for financial inclusion and remittances.

countries.name: Bangladesh
countries.description: Bangladesh Bank researching CBDC. Mobile money integration planned.

countries.name: Sri Lanka
countries.description: Central Bank researching CBDC amid economic crisis recovery.

countries.name: Mongolia
countries.description: Bank of Mongolia researching CBDC for financial modernization.

countries.name: Tanzania
countries.description: Bank of Tanzania researching CBDC for financial inclusion.

countries.name: Ethiopia
countries.description: Pilot testing for retail CBDC. Concerns about authoritarian control.

countries.name: Rwanda
countries.description: National Bank researching CBDC. Tech-focused financial innovation.

countries.name: Tunisia
countries.description: Central Bank researching CBDC amid economic challenges.

countries.name: Ecuador
countries.description: CBDC pilot ran 2014-2018. Discontinued due to low adoption. Historical CBDC case study.

countries.name: Venezuela
countries.description: Oil-backed cryptocurrency launched 2018. Not a true CBDC. Failed due to sanctions and lack of trust.

countries.name: Costa Rica
countries.description: Central Bank researching CBDC. Strong democratic institutions.

countries.name: Papua New Guinea
countries.description: Bank of Papua New Guinea researching CBDC for financial inclusion.

countries.name: Kuwait
countries.description: Central Bank researching CBDC for financial modernization.

countries.name: Oman
countries.description: Central Bank researching CBDC. Focus on cross-border payments.

countries.name: Georgia
countries.description: National Bank testing retail CBDC pilot. Blockchain innovation focus.

countries.name: Azerbaijan
countries.description: Central Bank researching CBDC. Authoritarian government concerns.

countries.description: Central Bank researching CBDC for financial modernization.
